data.name: HEART ABYSS
data.detailed_description:
Please consider that the game will be further released by episodes

Prologue is free. The number of episodes is unknown.

Explore the world!


Heart Abyss - is an adventure story that tells you about fates of three so different, yet connected to each other characters. Concept of the game is an action platformer mixed with stealth on certain character.

Plot
The game takes place in the world of Holspic, inhabited by different races, up to mythical creatures. Yet Holspic is in state of long war between two kingdoms ─ humans and beastmen. Beastmen of different subspecies use all kinds of military craft - magic, chemistry weapons... However, many humans do not have magical talents and, similar to dwarves, use various mechanisms, although there are magicians among them. Magic which humans able to use anomalously varies with all kinds of magical elements: from simple fire magic to materialization of the invisible. Moreover, if a human has magical potential, usually his magical power and energy are at an above average level. Thanks to this anomaly, it is much easier for humans to wage war than negotiations. Because of the war, the slave trade began to flourish, where beastmen, fairies and some types of elves, such as, for example, dark or winged, are sold at a high price.

Gameplay
At the moment, the prologue of the upcoming game is in development.
An action adventure with a side view, the gameplay of which smoothly changes over time. Calculate everything a few moves ahead, because the slightest mistake will mean restarting the whole level. If Leon, one of the main characters, dies at the beginning of the game from just hitting him, whether with a crossbow bolt in the back or a blow to the head with a steel sword, then opponents, on the contrary, do not die so willingly. Some opponents, like Leon, die from a single blow to them, but others can withstand a heavy blow from a fox-like creature. Do not underestimate the wounded opponents, each of them can bring you a lot of troubles, but which ones? Find out in the soonest demo of the prologue, which will be released already on June 13, 2022!

Features


o Multiple playable characters
o Dynamic gameplay
o Deep plot
o Convenient movement
o Cruelty
o Elements of the strategy

data.short_description: In a world where there is an eternal war between the unions of the human race and beastmen, accidental deaths and slave trade are not rare. But what happens if two slaves by chance unite and survive together, being wanted? Leon and Ray are one of those.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2*3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (512 MB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Heart Abyss contains scenes of crude violence, blood and strong language.
